name: Viking Age: Odin's warrior
summary: Betrayed by your allies. You must seek revenge and regain your families honour, so they can feast with the gods in the great hall. Experience this massive open world environment rife with danger and suspense. Build your own town, farm, boatyard or explore the lands as a homeless wanderer, the choice is completely yours. Try out the never before seen NPC system that allows you to hire them to do the more grinding tasks. But be careful as once they die they are gone forever. The lands themselves are harsh with a map size of 100km x 100km teaming with a variety of animals to hunt or be hunted by. Travel by your own 2 feet , or if you have the gold you can buy a horse or longboat.
